content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was about renting an apartment in Duisburg, a city in Germany, and negotiating the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The conversation did not reach a final price. The highest price that was offered was 600 euros a month, but the landlord was seeking a higher price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7. The conversation was primarily focused on the business aspect of the negotiation, but there was a respectful and professional tone maintained throughout.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.
name: Yi-Nuo
